Description: Saudi Public Transport (known as: Saptco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Saptco operates within the Transportation sector focusing on Trucking. It has Companies operating across Bahrain and Saudi Arabia, working on Trucking. Saptco is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1979.
